dcterms:creator: H. Ibraiwish
A. Elzanaty
Y. H. Al-Badarneh
M.-S. Alouini
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on EMF-aware cellular networks utilizing RIS technology to mitigate electromagnetic field exposure in communication environments.
dcterms:title: EMF-Aware Cellular Networks in RIS-Assisted Environments

dcterms:creator: E. Björnson
others
dcterms:description: This dataset provides a signal processing perspective on reconfigurable intelligent surfaces and their applications in wireless communications.
dcterms:title: Reconﬁgurable Intelligent Surfaces: A signal processing perspective with wireless applications

dcterms:creator: A. Zappone
M. D. Renzo
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses the optimization of energy efficiency in RIS with constraints related to electromagnetic field exposure.
dcterms:title: Energy Efﬁciency Optimization of Reconﬁgurable Intelligent Surfaces With Electromagnetic Field Exposure Constraints

dcterms:creator: H. Guo
others
dcterms:description: This dataset explores methods for avoiding electromagnetic field exposure through the use of non-intended user equipment and RIS.
dcterms:title: Electromagnetic Field Exposure Avoidance Thanks to Non-Intended User Equipment and RIS

dcterms:creator: Y. Lin
others
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on channel estimation and user localization techniques for IRS-assisted MIMO-OFDM systems.
dcterms:title: Channel Estimation and User Localization for IRS-Assisted MIMO-OFDM Systems

dcterms:creator: T. S. Rappaport
others
dcterms:description: This dataset provides an overview of millimeter wave communications for 5G networks, focusing on propagation models.
dcterms:title: Overview of Millimeter Wave Communications for Fifth-Generation (5G) Wireless Networks—With a Focus on Propagation Models

dcterms:creator: Z. Wang
others
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a framework for channel estimation in intelligent reflecting surface-assisted multiuser communications.
dcterms:title: Channel Estimation for Intelligent Reﬂecting Surface Assisted Multiuser Communications: Framework, Algorithms, and Analysis

dcterms:creator: F. Jiang
others
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the optimization of RIS-aided integrated localization and communication systems.
dcterms:title: Optimization of RIS-Aided Integrated Localization and Communication

dcterms:creator: K. Keykhosravi
others
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the use of RIS-enabled smart signal propagation to solve infeasible localization problems.
dcterms:title: Leveraging RIS-Enabled Smart Signal Propagation for Solving Infeasible Localization Problems

dcterms:creator: V. D. P. Souto
others
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a novel initial access method for 5G millimeter wave communications using a genetic algorithm.
dcterms:title: A Novel Efﬁcient Initial Access Method for 5G Millimeter Wave Communications Using Genetic Algorithm

dcterms:creator: A. Albanese
others
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses MARISA, a self-configuring metasurfaces absorption and reflection solution aimed at 6G.
dcterms:title: MARISA: A Self-conﬁguring Metasurfaces Absorption and Reﬂection Solution Towards 6G
